name: 100 Ways To Die 2: The Games!
description:
“The fact that we survive at all is a miracle...
Because, every day we live...We face 100 WAYS TO DIE." :P
Here comes the “100 WAYS TO DIE 2”. The dumb monster is not lonely anymore. This time, you gotta kill them all. Don’t hesitate, just make the kill begin. Are you smart enough to make them all die at once and leave no witness? Just challenge and let your stress out!

GOAL:
1.Kill all monsters that present in the scene.
2.Don’t let the monsters see each other die. Otherwise, you fail this level.

GAMEPLAY:
Tap, swipe, tilt, and shake your devices. Or you can even shout to the microphone of your device. So please give this game access to your microphone.

FEATURES:
* More than 10 monsters to be killed.
* 5 Different themes to choose: school, subway, beach, office and the gym. Just remember, death is everywhere. No need to pass one level to continue, just jump around.
* Achievement system: You can get a death achievement each time you trigger a type of death.
* Earn free game coins by trigger different types of death and by passing levels.
* In some of the scenes, the same monster can die differently. And this depends on you. You can decide their faith.
* Different endings depend on what you’ve done. So even if you are playing next to your bff, there may be a completely different ending.
* Ask facebook and twitter friends how to die? Or see how they make the monsters die.

Just remember:
Figure out as many as ways to die. A little blood never hurts much. You’re welcome to be cruel here.

If you have any interesting thoughts on the ways to die, or if you just want to make friends, feel free to contact us at: magicfantasyltd@hotmail.com
